body:
i'm thankful for [the ceiling above john keats' bed](https://twitter.com/janajmarie/status/975024184530165760).

i'm thankful for [this entry from susan sontag's diary](https://twitter.com/sontagdaily/status/975399951902457856).

i'm thankful for [the evening and the wine](https://twitter.com/MsJeanRhys/status/925779356030513153).

i'm thankful for [blankets](https://twitter.com/justjamiie/status/974826258008715264).

i'm thankful for [improbable containment](https://twitter.com/sweetestpoms/status/975348902403682305).

i'm thankful for [this fortune cookie](https://twitter.com/davidehrlich/status/974869236823810049).

i'm thankful for [monet and flonase](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/974837064893190144).

i'm thankful for [natalie going janet](https://open.spotify.com/track/15Mxy1YPE1zaEpqgqAG8o8?si=5PClKgwMQxmKTGXz2544mg).

i'm thankful [to talk to myself (and to you)](https://twitter.com/fakeirl/status/975025935077560321).
